nhc_headline: ...SARA NOW JUST INLAND OVER BELIZE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL TO CONTINUE AS IT MOVES INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
summary:
...SARA NOW JUST INLAND OVER BELIZE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL TO CONTINUE AS IT MOVES INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
 As of 9:00 AM CST Sun Nov 17
 the center of Sara was located near 17.1, -88.4
 with movement WNW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
